creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
description: complete surround with longer tail in front; green and white raised couched threads, cords, on red background; yellow metal couched in black threads surround designs; scalloped edges, each with tassels of many colors and white and yellow metal charms and bells (fish, flower petals) simulated pearls also dangle from collar
dimension: 13 x 13 in. (33.02 x 33.02 cm) (without fringe and tail)
medium: Cotton, silk, white and yellow metal
title: (Wedding?) Collar
